me.taylorkelly.mywarp.util

Class MatchList

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.taylorkelly.mywarp.util.MatchList

  • public class MatchList
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides delegated access to a given Collection of warps via name filtering. Once created the matching is 'static' as matching warps are internally stored in the instance. If changes need to be reflected, a new instance needs to be created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatchList(java.lang.String filter, java.lang.Iterable<Warp> matchingWarps)
      Initializes a MatchList using the given filter to filter warp-names, operating upon the given warps.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets an Optional that contains an exact match (if such a Warp exists).
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Warp> getMatch()
      Gets an Optional that contains the Warp that matches this Matchers criteria and is the first when sorting all matching warps naturally (if such a Warp exists).
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Warp> getMatch(java.util.Comparator<Warp> comparator)
      Gets an Optional that contains the Warp that matches this Matchers criteria and is the first when sorting all matching warps with the given Comparator (if such a Warp exists).
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Warp> getMatches()
      Gets a naturally sorted immutable list that contains all warps matching this Matchers criteria.

      Gets a sorted immutable list that contains all warps matching this Matchers criteria.

      Returns whether this MatchList contains any elements.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MatchList

        public MatchList(java.lang.String filter,
                 java.lang.Iterable<Warp> matchingWarps)
        Initializes a MatchList using the given filter to filter warp-names, operating upon the given warps.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter
        matchingWarps - an Iterable of matching warps this MatchList should operate on

    • Method Detail

      • getExactMatch

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<Warp> getExactMatch()
        Gets an Optional that contains an exact match (if such a Warp exists). A Warp is an exact match if it fulfills one of the following conditions, starting from the top:
        1. the only Warp whose name contains case-insensitively this MatchList's filer,
        2. the only Warp whose name is case insensitively equal to this MatchList's filter,
        3. the only Warp whose name is equal to this MatchList's filter.
        Returns:
        a exactly matching Warp

      • getMatches

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Warp> getMatches()
        Gets a naturally sorted immutable list that contains all warps matching this Matchers criteria.
        Returns:
        a list of all matches

      • getMatches

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Warp> getMatches(java.util.Comparator<Warp> comparator)
        Gets a sorted immutable list that contains all warps matching this Matchers criteria.
        Parameters:
        comparator - the comparator used to sort the list
        Returns:
        a list of all matches

      • getMatch

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<Warp> getMatch()
        Gets an Optional that contains the Warp that matches this Matchers criteria and is the first when sorting all matching warps naturally (if such a Warp exists).
        Returns:
        a matching Warp

      • getMatch

        public com.google.common.base.Optional<Warp> getMatch(java.util.Comparator<Warp> comparator)
        Gets an Optional that contains the Warp that matches this Matchers criteria and is the first when sorting all matching warps with the given Comparator (if such a Warp exists).
        Parameters:
        comparator - the comparator used to sort the matches
        Returns:
        a matching Warp

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns whether this MatchList contains any elements.
        Returns:
        true if this Matcher is empty
